name: Star Fire (itch) (ASD Games)
description:
Star Fire is simple arcade game where you must capture the hollow circles called 'Stars' launching your star, try to capture the much as you can. But be careful, you have initial 12 launches, you recover 1 if you capture a Star, and game over if you run out of launches.

There's only one programmer and the game still in development and bug fixing stage, let me know any issues. Your feedback is fully essential to make the game smooth as possible.
